description.original: Hides & Toggles configured folders (e.g. attachments folders).
description.translation: 隐藏和切换配置的文件夹（如附件文件夹）

dict.name: \"Toggle visibility of hidden fold: name: "切换隐藏文件夹的可见性"
dict..setName(\"Add Hidden Folders to Obsidia: .setName("将隐藏文件夹加入Obsidian排除列表")
dict..setName('Hide bottom status-bar \"Folde: .setName('隐藏底部状态栏的"文件夹已隐藏"指示器')
dict..setDesc(\"The names of the folders to h: .setDesc("要隐藏的文件夹名称（每行一个），可以是精确名称、startsWith::文件夹前缀 或 endsWith::文件夹后缀")
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, 'SOMEFOLDER', 'so: .setDesc("启用后，'SOMEFOLDER'、'someFolder'和'sOmeFoldEr'将被视为相同并匹配")
dict..setDesc(\"Excluded files will be hidden: .setDesc("排除文件将在搜索、图谱视图和未链接提及中隐藏，在快速切换器和链接建议中显示较不显眼")
dict..setDesc(\"If enable there will be no bo: .setDesc("启用后将不再显示底部状态栏的插件激活提示文本")
dict..setDesc(\"[WARNING: UNSTABLE] Also hide: .setDesc("[警告：不稳定] 同时在 https://github.com/pjeby/quick-explorer 插件中隐藏文件夹。与quick-explorer作者无关联")
dict..setDesc(\"Report Issues or Ideas, see t: .setDesc("报告问题或建议，查看源代码并参与贡献")
dict..setDesc(\"If you like this open-source: .setDesc("如果您喜欢这个开源插件，可以考虑打赏支持我的无偿工作")
